snippet: Two ancient sculptures from “Pergamon and the Hellenistic Kingdoms of the Ancient World,” which closes on Sunday, will remain on display through fall 2018....
abstract: Metropolitan Museum of Art will keep two sculptures central to exhibit Pergamon and the Hellenistic Kingdoms of the Ancient World on view through fall 2018.
lead_paragraph: Two ancient sculptures from “Pergamon and the Hellenistic Kingdoms of the Ancient World,” which closes on Sunday, will remain on display through fall 2018.

headline.main: Two Old Visitors to the Metropolitan Museum Will Stay a While
headline.print_headline: Athena, and a Friend, Will Hang Around at the Met

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Pergamon and the Hellenistic Kingdoms of the Ancient World (Exhibit)
